title: Marjorie Taylor Greene testifying at hearing over whether she should be disqualified from running for reelection - CNN
content:
1. Marjorie Taylor Greene testifying at hearing over whether she should be disqualified from running for reelection  CNN
  2. Marjorie Taylor Greene appears in court over lawsuit challenging her re-election  FOX 5 Atlanta
  3. Watch live: Marjorie Taylor Greene testifies at hearing challenging her House candidacy  The Hill
  4. Destroying democracy to save it? Court advances effort to block GOP candidates from ballots  The Hill
  5. Court hearing for Marjorie Taylor Greene could impact run for re-election  11Alive
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: A potentially precedent-setting disqualification hearing is underway Friday in an Atlanta courtroom, aimed at determining if Republican Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia is constitutionally barred from running for reelection because of her role in the January 6 insurrection.
